How many people are affected by atelosteogenesis type 3 ?,Atelosteogenesis type 3 is a rare disorder; its exact prevalence is unknown. About two dozen affected individuals have been identified.,GHR,atelosteogenesis type 3
What are the genetic changes related to atelosteogenesis type 3 ?,"Mutations in the FLNB gene cause atelos
